workflow.name: Telegram to Google Drive: auto upload & track videos with Gemini AI assistant
workflow.description:
üöÄ Overview

This workflow automates video uploads from Telegram directly to Google Drive, complete with smart file renaming, Google Sheets logging, and AI assistance via Google Gemini. It‚Äôs perfect for creators, educators, or organizations that want to streamline video submissions and file management.

‚öôÔ∏è How It Works

1. Telegram Trigger -> Start the workflow when a user sends a video file to your Telegram bot.
2. Switch Node -> Detects file type or command and routes the flow accordingly.
3. Get File -> Downloads the Telegram video file.
4. Upload to Google Drive -> Automatically uploads the video to your chosen Drive folder.
5. Smart Rename -> The file name is auto-formatted using dynamic logic (date, username, or custom tags).
6. Google Sheets Logging -> Appends or updates upload data (e.g., filename, sender, timestamp) for easy tracking.
7. AI Agent Integration -> Uses Google Gemini AI connected to Data Vidio memory to analyze or respond intelligently to user queries.
8. Telegram Notification -> Sends confirmation or status messages back to Telegram.

üß† Highlights

- Seamlessly integrates Telegram ‚Üí Google Drive ‚Üí Google Sheets ‚Üí Gemini AI
- Supports file update or append mode
- Auto-rename logic via the Code node
- Works with custom memory tools for smarter AI responses
- Easy to clone and adapt, just connect your own credentials

ü™Ñ Ideal Use Cases

- Video assignment submissions for schools or academies
- Media upload management for marketing teams
- Automated video archiving and AI-assisted review
- Personal Telegram-to-Drive backup assistant

üß© Setup Tips

1. Copy and use the provided Google Sheet template (SheetTemplate)
2. Configure your Telegram Bot token, Google Drive, and Sheets credentials
3. Update the AI Agent node with your Gemini API key and connect the Data Vidio sheet
4. Test with a sample Telegram video before full automation

parameters.text:
=Vidio is in!

Rename the file:
`/edit {{ $json['File ID'] }} name`

options.systemMessage:
You are an AI agent and the user‚Äôs personal assistant, responsible for answering any questions from the user.
If the question involves data, use the **Data Vidio** tool to provide the answer.

**Note:**

* ALWAYS USE EMOJIS WHEN RESPONDING. üòÑ
* ALWAYS CHECK THE TOOL (**Data Vidio**) FIRST TO SEE IF IT HAS AN ANSWER. üîç

parameters.content:
## 1. Trigger & Routing

Telegram Trigger ‚Üí Switch

**Purpose**
* Detects every incoming message/video from your Telegram bot.
* The Switch node routes the message into 3 paths:

  * **Video** ‚Üí automatic upload flow.
  * **/edit** ‚Üí rename file flow.
  * **Any text** ‚Üí handled by the AI Agent.
---
**Rules Used**
* `message.video exists` ‚Üí upload process.
* `message.text startsWith("/edit")` ‚Üí rename process.
* `message.text exists` ‚Üí AI response.

## üöÄ Overview

This workflow automates Telegram-to-Google Drive video uploads with smart renaming, Google Sheets logging, and Gemini AI assistance. Ideal for creators, educators, and automation-focused teams.


## ‚öôÔ∏è How It Works

* **Telegram Trigger** ‚Üí Starts the workflow when a user sends a video to your bot.
* **Switch Node** ‚Üí Detects file type or command and routes the flow.
* **Get File** ‚Üí Downloads the Telegram video file.
* **Upload to Google Drive** ‚Üí Sends the file to your chosen Drive folder.
* **Smart Rename (Code Node)** ‚Üí Auto-formats the filename using dynamic logic.
* **Google Sheets Logging** ‚Üí Appends/upload data for easy tracking.
* **AI Agent (Gemini)** ‚Üí Uses Data Vidio memory to analyze or respond.
* **Telegram Notification** ‚Üí Sends status updates back to the user.

## üß† Highlights

* Full integration: Telegram ‚Üí Google Drive ‚Üí Google Sheets ‚Üí Gemini AI
* Supports append/update modes
* Dynamic filename generation
* AI memory integration
* Easy to clone and adapt

## ü™Ñ Ideal Use Cases

* Video assignment submissions
* Media team content management
* Automated archiving with AI analysis
* Personal Telegram-to-Drive assistant

## üß© Setup Tips

* Use the provided Google Sheets template
* Configure your bot token, Google Drive, and Sheets credentials
* Insert your Gemini API key and connect Data Vidio
* Test with a sample video before going live

## 4. AI Auto-Reply System

**AI Agent ‚Üí Gemini Model ‚Üí Memory ‚Üí Data Sheet ‚Üí Telegram Reply**

**Purpose**

Handles all non-video and non-/edit text messages through an AI Agent that:

* Has per-user memory.
* Can access Google Sheets (Data Vidio).
* Uses Gemini as the LLM.

---
**AI Capabilities**
* Fetch sheet data to answer user queries.
* Remember conversation context.
* Respond with emojis.
* Follow the system prompt as the user‚Äôs personal assistant.

## 2. Video Upload Process

**Get a file1 ‚Üí Upload file1 ‚Üí Append row ‚Üí Send message**

**Workflow**

1. Get a file1
   Retrieves the video file from Telegram using `file_id`.

2. Upload file1
   Automatically uploads the file to Google Drive.

3. Append row in sheet
   Logs all metadata into Google Sheets:

   * File name
   * Drive link
   * File size
   * Duration
   * Upload timestamp
   * Last update timestamp

4. Send message
   The bot replies with:

   * Confirmation the video was uploaded
   * Command template for renaming the file

## 3. File Rename Process

**Code1 ‚Üí Update file ‚Üí Update row ‚Üí Send message**

**Rename Flow**

1. Code1
   Parses the `/edit ID new_name` command.

2. Update file1
   Renames the file in Google Drive.

3. Update row in sheet
   Updates sheet row based on:

   * ID File
   * File Name
   * Last Update

4. Send message
   Sends success confirmation to Telegram.

---
**Command Format**
```
/edit <FILE_ID> <new file name>
```
